welcome.title: European Languages with AI
welcome.subtitle: Dialogues for Life
welcome.text1: Create personalized dialogues in any of the available European languages by specifying your level, topic, and keywords.
welcome.text2: The application is your personal tutor, offering unique training modes: from simple text familiarization to practicing pronunciation and translation skills.
welcome.text3: Get instant feedback, detailed grammatical and lexical analysis, adapted to your level.

modal.title: Dialogue completed.
modal.text: Great job! You can listen to it, analyze it, or start the training again.

level1.description: Listen to the line, read the original and translation. Step by step. Repeat the phrase or the entire dialogue at any time.
level1.descriptionMobile: Listen, read, and repeat step by step.

level2.description: Check your pronunciation and fix mistakes. Move through the dialogue step by step, repeating its parts for perfect mastery.
level2.descriptionMobile: Speak boldly and correctly! Check your pronunciation and fix mistakes.
level2.info: 'Microphone': say the line. Press again to check for errors.
